sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../css/baskets.css'; import utils from '../utils' import useProducts from './useProducts'; const Baskets = (props) => { const {cartItems,onAddCart,onRemoveCart} = useProducts() return(
Cart
{cartItems.length} Items
{cartItems.length>0 ?
{cartItems.map(item => (

{item.title}

onRemoveCart(item)} className="minus"/> onAddCart(item)} className="plus"/>

{utils.formatCurrency(item.price * item.count)}

)) }
Subtotal {utils.formatCurrency(cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.price * c.count,0))}

Extra charges may apply

:''}
) } export default Baskets;
